title: Ace of Spades discusses #GamerGate
author: VD
content_html:
He’s talking with Clark of PopeHat on the subject. Clark has an interesting tribalistic interpretation of the cultural war. His idea is that many people’s position is primarily based on their tribal identity rather than on the basis of an actual opinion on the subject.

WARNING TO CERTAIN SOUTHRONS: I’m listening and some minor Moldbuggery is involved.
